channel.title: Another question by the one who asks too many... lol
channel.description: Ok this should be a simple answer but how do i change it so that when your in a shop you can buy 1 5 10 etc. i want to add a buy 50, 100, and 1k. What file and where do I do this at? Client or server? Plz help! Thank you for all your help you givenme so far... -ghostly(150)

item.title: Another question by the one who asks too many... lol
item.dc:creator: @Phineas Phineas
item.description:
@Phineas wrote:

Its been a while… okay uhm, go into your client.java, and search up Buy 10 for example or something like that. There will be some sort of code confirming it will buy 10 of that item like, you will see something like “if = 10” or w.e. Change that number to what you want it to be. Now changing the frame of it Idk, it will stay say “buy 10” but it will actually be the number you changed it to. Hope this helped.

Read full topic
item.source: Another question by the one who asks too many... lol
